title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as a local LLM backend for chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting with local models; supports multi-user, RAG, and plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or Sinatra apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset for using Ollama models in production retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chatbot, voice assistant, function-calling, GPU farming, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of compose files: CPU, NVIDIA, AMD, with WebUI, NextCloud, and RAG stacks.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds and development shells across macOS/Linux.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight async Rust crate wrapping the Ollama REST API with serde types.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes OpenAI-compatible endpoints backed by Ollama for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app with session memory, model selector, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete, summarization, and note Q&A using Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app for bringing local LLMs into channels with thread support and rate limits.
